Serialized Form

  • Package com.github.tommyettinger.random

    • Class com.github.tommyettinger.random.ChopRandom

      class ChopRandom extends EnhancedRandom implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • stateA
          int stateA
          The first state; can be any int.
        • stateB
          int stateB
          The second state; can be any int.
        • stateC
          int stateC
          The third state; can be any int. If this has just been set to some value, then the next call to ChopRandom.nextInt() will return that value as-is. Later calls will be more random.
        • stateD
          int stateD
          The fourth state; can be any int.

    • Class com.github.tommyettinger.random.DistinctRandom

      class DistinctRandom extends EnhancedRandom implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • state
          long state
          The only state variable; can be any long.

    • Class com.github.tommyettinger.random.EnhancedRandom

      class EnhancedRandom extends Random implements Serializable

    • Class com.github.tommyettinger.random.FourWheelRandom

      class FourWheelRandom extends EnhancedRandom implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • stateA
          long stateA
          The first state; can be any long.
        • stateB
          long stateB
          The second state; can be any long.
        • stateC
          long stateC
          The third state; can be any long.
        • stateD
          long stateD
          The fourth state; can be any long. If this has just been set to some value, then the next call to FourWheelRandom.nextLong() will return that value as-is. Later calls will be more random.

    • Class com.github.tommyettinger.random.LaserRandom

      class LaserRandom extends EnhancedRandom implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • stateA
          long stateA
          Can be any long value.
        • stateB
          long stateB
          Must be odd.

    • Class com.github.tommyettinger.random.MizuchiRandom

      class MizuchiRandom extends EnhancedRandom implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • stateA
          long stateA
          The first state, also called the changing state; can be any long.
        • stateB
          long stateB
          The second state, also called the stream; can be any odd-number long.

    • Class com.github.tommyettinger.random.RomuTrioRandom

      class RomuTrioRandom extends EnhancedRandom implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • stateA
          long stateA
          The first state; can be any long unless all states are 0. If this has just been set to some value, then the next call to RomuTrioRandom.nextLong() will return that value as-is. Later calls will be more random.
        • stateB
          long stateB
          The second state; can be any long; can be any long unless all states are 0.
        • stateC
          long stateC
          The third state; can be any long; can be any long unless all states are 0.

    • Class com.github.tommyettinger.random.StrangerRandom

      class StrangerRandom extends EnhancedRandom implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • stateA
          long stateA
          The first state; can be any long except 0
        • stateB
          long stateB
          The second state; can be any long except 0, and should be a significant distance from stateA in the xorshift sequence.
        • stateC
          long stateC
          The third state; can be any long. If this has just been set to some value, then the next call to StrangerRandom.nextLong() will return that value as-is. Later calls will be more random.
        • stateD
          long stateD
          The fourth state; can be any long.

    • Class com.github.tommyettinger.random.TricycleRandom

      class TricycleRandom extends EnhancedRandom implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • stateA
          long stateA
          The first state; can be any long. If this has just been set to some value, then the next call to TricycleRandom.nextLong() will return that value as-is. Later calls will be more random.
        • stateB
          long stateB
          The second state; can be any long.
        • stateC
          long stateC
          The third state; can be any long.

    • Class com.github.tommyettinger.random.TrimRandom

      class TrimRandom extends EnhancedRandom implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • stateA
          long stateA
          The first state; can be any long.
        • stateB
          long stateB
          The second state; can be any long.
        • stateC
          long stateC
          The third state; can be any long. If this has just been set to some value, then the next call to TrimRandom.nextLong() will return that value as-is. Later calls will be more random.
        • stateD
          long stateD
          The fourth state; can be any long.

    • Class com.github.tommyettinger.random.Xoshiro256StarStarRandom

      class Xoshiro256StarStarRandom extends EnhancedRandom implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • stateA
          long stateA
          The first state; can be any long, as long as all states are not 0.
        • stateB
          long stateB
          The second state; can be any long, as long as all states are not 0. This is the state that is scrambled and returned; if it is 0 before a number is generated, then the next number will be 0.
        • stateC
          long stateC
          The third state; can be any long, as long as all states are not 0.
        • stateD
          long stateD
          The fourth state; can be any long, as long as all states are not 0.
